prompt_base: cinematic portrait of a colossal bio-android warrior, **dark emerald green chitinous exoskeleton, black spots, regal head horns, giant black insectoid eyes, intricate biomechanical wings**
feature_prompt: extreme texture detail on chitin, wet biological sheen, volumetric rim lighting, realistic segmented plating
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, plastic texture, human face, fleshy skin, toy, doll, flat lighting, blurry wings, yellow skin, smooth shell
